name: Hotwives on Holiday - Day 2
description:
Jasmine (Hotwife) and Callie (cheating wife) go on a three-day holiday to Cancún, Mexico. They enjoy the sun, the surf, and the SEX.

The only problem is that they are at odds as to how to make the sex happen. Jasmine's husband knows she fucks other men and approves. Callie's husband does not know she cheats on him. The two women disagree which method is best. Time will tell.

Day 1 is available separately. This file is Day 2 of their 3 day vacation. Each day contains new, sexy adventures for these two best friends.

If you already own Day 1 of the game, you can download Day 2 and play them consecutively.

If you are new to the story, order Hotwives on Holiday - Days 1 & 2 as a single Visual Novel.

The full adventure, containing 3 Days of fun and sex is expected to be complete Spring 2023. In the meantime, enjoy the first two days of fun.
